name: Free Select
description: sister mod to free snap | draw hooks

lasso-always-enabled.name: Lasso Always Enabled
lasso-always-enabled.description: makes lasso the default instead of rect select | on mobile used to disable the lasso select part of the mod and also works in reverse cuz :3c

grid-size.name: Grid Size
grid-size.description: smaller number means more accurate but prolly more laggy, 15 is fine for almost all cases, if u wanna know my scuffed way of lasso selecting u can read about

make-points-boxes.name: Make Points Boxes
make-points-boxes.description: makes lasso a lil more lenient by checking squares of grid size instead of just points

guarantee-center.name: Guarantee Center
guarantee-center.description: took me multiple tries to spell and yk it | always place a selection point at the center of the min/max of the lasso selection
